headline: Ask HN: Language Aware Diffs on GitHub Pull Requests
description:
Hi HN! We were frustrated with text diffs on GitHub PRs, so we made DiffLens (https://github.com/marketplace/difflens) to produce language aware diffs on PRs. DiffLens constructs an Abstract Syntax Tree for each file, and uses that semantic information to intelligently diff changes. Checkout the demo on our website (https://www.difflens.com). If you review code, especially TypeScript, JavaScript or CSS, give DiffLens a try, it's free!
We're looking for feedback from developers. If you share our frustrations with reviewing code changes, we'd love to talk to you. Most developers already have a favourite diff tool installed locally but there exists very little for reviewing code changes online, so we worked on DiffLens slowly over a number of years. We use it to review our own code changes, and we love it. We'd really appreciate thoughts and insights about the idea and its execution from developers and will answer any questions that come up. Thanks for reading!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: GitHub拉动请求中的语言感知差异
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: GitHub拉動請求中的語言感知差異
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN! 我们对GitHub PRs上的文本差异感到失望，所以我们制作了DiffLens（https://github.com/marketplace/difflens），以便在PRs上产生语言感知差异。DiffLens为每个文件构建了一个抽象语法树，并使用这些语义信息来智能地进行差异。请看我们网站上的演示（https://www.difflens.com）。如果你在审查代码，特别是TypeScript、JavaScript或CSS，请试一试DiffLens，它是免费的。
我们希望得到开发者的反馈。如果你和我们一样对审查代码修改感到沮丧，我们很愿意和你谈谈。大多数开发者已经在本地安装了最喜欢的Diff工具，但用于在线审查代码变更的工具却很少，所以我们在数年内慢慢开发了DiffLens。我们用它来审查我们自己的代码变化，而且我们很喜欢它。我们非常感谢开发者对这个想法及其执行的看法和见解，并将回答任何出现的问题。谢谢你的阅读!
